name: AI QUIZ
description:
AI Quiz App ‚Äì Learn Smarter, Not Harder
AI Quiz App is a smart learning companion designed to help students and learners test their understanding of any topic using AI-generated quizzes. Simply enter a topic or syllabus, choose the difficulty level, and the app instantly creates a structured quiz tailored to your learning needs.
Built with a clean, distraction-free interface, the app focuses on clarity, stability, and learning efficiency‚Äîno unnecessary clutter, no overwhelming animations, and no confusing navigation.
